actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-166.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R.99) to provide for the conservation, rehabilitation, and improvement of natural and cultural resources located on public or Indian lands, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 99 (conservation projects).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R.99) to provide for the conservation, rehabilitation, and improvement of natural and cultural resources located on public or Indian lands, and for other purposes.
